Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !page
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !page [character] "[message]"
EXAMPLE: !page SexDoll "I don't think your name is appropriate for this game."
Sends a message to the designated character. This is the preferred method for initially dealing with player issues and problems as it is non-intrusive to other players in the game.
SEE ALSO: !broadcast
